document.full_text: judge james zagel chastised former gov. rod r. blagojevich on wednesday for 'smuggling' testimony into his political corruption retrial that had been ruled inadmissible.
document.title: midwest: illinois: judge admonishes blagojevich
lines_and_colors: judge james zagel chastised former gov. rod r. blagojevich on wednesday for 'smuggling' testimony into his political corruption retrial that had been ruled inadmissible.
